text: puok del ban niyeay tha chea karpit nasa a l laoh ku mea sie h( ai sa) kaun robsa mea r yea noh pitchea klaycha puok del kmean chomnue . haey mea sie h ban pol tha ao ambaur aisreael. chaur puok anak korp sakkar champoh a l laoh chea mcheasa robsakhnhom ning chea mcheasa robsa puok anak . pitabrakd nasa anaknea thveu shi ri k nung a l laoh a l laoh pitchea ban hamkhat ke ampi thansuokr haey kanleng snaknow robsa ke ku thanonork . haey champoh puok del bampean ku poum mean anak chuoy laey
